summary: Completed comprehensive testing of API Health Monitor implementation in Admin Panel System tab. Backend endpoints fully functional, frontend partially working with UI improvements needed.

ui_bugs.issue: Requests and Errors tabs not properly rendered or accessible via automation
ui_bugs.selector: Requests (19) and Errors (2) tabs visible but not clickable

integration_issues.issue: Only Summary and Settings tabs fully accessible via automation, Requests/Errors tabs have selector issues

issues: Requests and Errors tabs show counts (19) (2) but may have compound selectors making automation difficult

passed_tests: GET /api/admin/system/api-logs/stats returns complete stats with all expected fields
GET /api/admin/system/api-requests with status_code and search filters
Admin Panel System tab loads with API Health Monitor section
Summary tab displays API health metrics (Active status, request counts, error counts, response times)
Settings tab fully functional with retention dropdown, auto-cleanup toggle, save/cleanup buttons
Tab navigation between Summary and Settings working correctly
API logging system capturing requests/errors to MongoDB collections
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Requests and Errors tab accessibility - tabs are visible but automation cannot interact with them properly. May need to check data-testid attributes or simplify selectors for 'Requests (19)' and 'Errors (2)' tabs.
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (11/11 tests passed), Frontend: 75% (Summary and Settings working, Requests/Errors tabs partially accessible)
